General.Name: BTM Resources Bhd
General.Description: BTM Resources Berhad, an investment holding company, operates as an integrated timber company in Malaysia. The company is involved in the logging, sawmilling, and trading in sawn timbers, plywood, and logs; timber molding; and manufacturing of finger-jointed timber and wood pellet, and lamination boards; kiln-drying operations; and letting plant and machineries. It also exports its products to Australia, Japan, Korea, Europe, Thailand, the United State, etc. BTM Resources Berhad was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Kuala Terengganu, Malaysia.
General.Address: No. 101, Wisma Kam Choon, Kuala Terengganu, Malaysia, 20000
